author: bsunanda
body: This is based on the IB CMSSW_7_6_X_2015-07-22-2300 and is on the top of PR 10268 which should have merged by now. This provides most of the material for reconstruction geometry and topology code for HGCal. The missing part are the test codes which will be integrated later
title: bsunanda:Run2-hgx30 Try to add the reconstruction geometry and topology for HGCal
